book.synopsis: Compose beautiful scenes and images to soothe the spirit with this desk-size garden complete with base, sand, rocks, and a miniature wooden rake. The accompanying fully-illustrated book is a general introduction to the art of Japanese gardening and the zen garden.
book.dimensions: Height: 10.5 Inches, Length: 6.75 Inches, Weight: 1.82322290674 Pounds, Width: 1.75 Inches
